elements.title: Azerbaijani flag (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the blue stripe in the Azerbaijani flag (pictured) reflects the country's Turkic heritage?

elements.title: Vivien Lyra Blair (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Vivien Lyra Blair's performance was deemed "just absurd" in the Netflix film We Can Be Heroes?

elements.title: Redcliffe railway station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Redcliffe railway station has been renamed twice since 2016?

elements.title: Mayu Island (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that although Mayu Island has an area of less than one square kilometer (0.4 sq mi), it has two different temples honoring the same goddess?

elements.title: Keri Blakinger (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after Keri Blakinger left Cornell University to serve time in prison for possession of heroin, she returned to finish her degree and then became a criminal justice reporter?

elements.title: 10 Things I Hate About You (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that although Leah Kate's single "10 Things I Hate About You" shares the same name as the 1999 movie, she said that she did not use it as inspiration for the song?

elements.title: Alf Lowe (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Royal Navy boy seaman Alf Lowe was awarded the Albert Medal for Lifesaving for his actions during a 1948 sinking that killed 29 men?

elements.title: New Zealand Women Writers' Society (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the first meeting of the New Zealand Women Writers' Society was chaired by a man?
